players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. We should vote her out today."
Bob: "I'm a villager. Diana was killed last night, and Charlie is accusing Alice. I don't have any special abilities, so I'll be observing everyone's behavior closely. Let's discuss this calmly."
You: "I am the detective, and I investigated Charlie last night. He is the mafioso. He is trying to frame me to save himself."

Bob: "Alice claims to be the detective and says Charlie is the mafioso. Charlie claims Alice is the mafioso. Without any concrete evidence, this is difficult. I'm a villager, so I don't have any special insight. I'll be listening to..."
You: "I am the detective, and I investigated Charlie. He is mafia. Don't be fooled by his lies."
Charlie: "Alice is lying. I am the detective and I investigated her. She is mafia. Bob, you must vote with me to win."
